pkgmetadata.longdescription: Generalized Farlie-Gumbel-Morgenstern Copula // Compute bivariate dependence measures and perform bivariate competing risks analysis under the generalized Farlie-Gumbel-Morgenstern (FGM) copula. See Shih and Emura (2018) doi:10.1007/s00180-018-0804-0 and Shih and Emura (2019) doi:10.1007/s00362-016-0865-5 for details.
